message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $130. It's in great condition and worth every penny. Let me know if you're interested!
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $120 is just a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $125.  Let's see if we can make this work!
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to come down to $125, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $122?
